name: Whisper Of The Storm God
text:
Cost: 1 AP, 1 signature.
Summon a temporary tornado at a location within range. Characters near the tornado are lifted into the air and immobilized if their remaining HP is less than or equal to your devotion to the storm god.
Characters whose chosen deity is the storm god are unaffected by the tornado.

Increase your devotion to the storm god by 2.
